sub_fields.label: Parent
sub_fields.name: parent
sub_fields.instructions: Will display all child pages in a list.

sub_fields.label: Directory Category
sub_fields.name: directory_category
sub_fields.instructions: All directory items in selected category will be displayed in alphabetical order.

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: video_id
sub_fields.instructions: For Vimeo, this is the number that follows the "/" for Youtube, this is the string that follows "/watch?v=".

sub_fields.label: Table
sub_fields.name: table
sub_fields.instructions: To create a link, you will need to include the HTML code in the form: <a href="http://google.com">Link Text</a>

sub_fields.label: Tabs
sub_fields.name: tabs
sub_fields.instructions: Use this block on pages with and without sidebars. If you use it on a page that uses the page template "Parent - No Sidebar" it MUST be the first block used.

sub_fields.label: Tab Name
sub_fields.name: tab_name
sub_fields.instructions: Single word identifier that is not used in the display of this page block.

sub_fields.label: Tab Label
sub_fields.name: tab_label
sub_fields.instructions: Used in the tab as a label that describes tab content.
